name: LITTLE RIDING RED HOOD VERSUS CYBER WOLVES
name_original: LITTLE RIDING RED HOOD VERSUS CYBER WOLVES
description:
THIS GAME IS  SICK PLAY IT NOW AAAAAAAAA
Shift - Use turbo (Important)
WASD - Movement
Q/E - Roll
Left Mouse Button - Light Attack
Right Mouse Button - Heavy Attack
Space - Special Attack

Tip: Be fast, avoid homing missiles using your turbo speed, out range your opponents and destroy it all. You rock. 
PS: The boss is amazing, try to complete the game, it worth it.
